link_desc:
• Note that this is a version 0.1 of the template. The included script is very quick and dirty.
  • Note that this template was tested against NextCloud version 14.0.
  • Note that this template was created and testes under the 4.0.2 version of Zabbix.
  • Note that this template is non-official and not being maintained by Zabbix SIA or NextCloud GmbH.

The template utilizes the HTTP Agent, Master\Dependent items, Shell script, and NextCloud’s REST API and Preprocessing steps

The script must be placed in the ExternalScripts directory, be executable and runnable by zabbix user.

You must configure at least the following macro:

  • {$T_NEXTCLOUD_USER} – your admin username
  • {$T_NEXTCLOUD_PASSWORD}- your admin password
  • {$T_NEXTCLOUD_PATH}- path to the nextcloud, i.e. /nextcloud.

Standard metrics:

  • General
    • NextCloud version
    • Web server engine and version
    • DB type
    • DB size
  • Security
    • Password must contain numerical characters
    • Password must be a mix of Upper/Lower case characters
    • Password must contain special characters
    • Minimum password length
    • Number of shared links w/o password protection
  • Users
    • Number of active users for past 24h
    • Number of registered users

+ LLD Discovered items
features: Low Level Discovery (LLD)|Custom Script|Dependent Items|HTTP Agent
tags: nextcloud, file share, api, http agent
author: Aleksejs Petrovs
